org.apache.lucene.sandbox.facet.utils

Packages that use org.apache.lucene.sandbox.facet.utils
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.sandbox.facet.utils
Sandbox faceting: utility classes to make it easier to use the new API for standard use cases.
  • Classes in org.apache.lucene.sandbox.facet.utils used by org.apache.lucene.sandbox.facet.utils

    Description

    Common FacetBuilder that works with any FacetCutter and OrdToLabel provided by user.
